column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
A brief narrative of the changes I made
- Increase 2 hosted zones, each zone has 10000 records
- Increase 50 number of site-to-site VPN connections, average duration of each connection is 24/24, working days 30 days
- Add backup storage and snapshot export to RDS
- Use Amazon cloudwatch to export log and alarm
